name: Pako The Destroyer
description:
In a world invaded by ugly sprites, only a handsome video game developer can save it. Pako The Destroyer.

A & D or <- & ->: Move
Space: Jump
LeftClick: Shoot
P: Pause
Esc: Close Game

Made by:

- Fernando Doblas 
@DoblasFernando
- Ezequiel Pérez Anaya 
https://ezequielperezanaya.itch.io/
- Francisco Domínguez Pedrosa 
@PakOrgg https://elgoblinrojo.itch.io/

This game is a project made for fun, we will develop it with time.

Music:

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Captain_Glouglous_Incredible_Week_Sound...

Background:
